title: Here’s How Much Bitcoin Is Locked Up in Sidechains Right Now
text:
Here’s How Much Bitcoin Is Locked Up in Sidechains Right Now

Cryptocurrency News 1 hour ago (Oct 17, 2019 03:41AM ET)

© Reuters. Here’s How Much Bitcoin Is Locked Up in Sidechains Right Now Almost $77 million of (BTC) is currently unavailable to use on the network — not because it is lost, but because it is locked up in sidechains. Data from block explorers confirms that as of Oct. 17, a total of 9,661 BTC ($76.96 million) or a tiny 0.054% of today’s Bitcoin supply resides in three major sidechain projects. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph

Here’s How Much Bitcoin Is Locked Up in Sidechains Right Now
